name: Mineplex-gadgets
body:
Mineplex-Gadgets
================
Mineplex Gadgets
![Mineplex Gadgets on SpigotMC](http://www.spigotmc.org/data/resource_icons/1/1615.jpg?1414457414)
All of Mineplex's Gadgets, in a chest...
This maven thingy was made by @xiurobert...
You MAY fork, you MAY make a pull request...

## Compiling
1. Download the .zip
2. Install maven
3. Extract the contents of the zip somewhere
4. Get its location and in the terminal (Mac + linux) `$cd /where/you/extracted/the/contents` or command prompt (Windows) `C:\> cd "C:\where\you\extracted\the\file"`.
5. Then `mvn clean package` or `mvn clean install`(DO ONLY ONE!!!)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
